enhanced_by.reason: The method chompLeadingDot is used to preprocess the input string by removing leading dots, which is a necessary step before checking the TLD.
The method unicodeToASCII is used to convert the input string to ASCII format, which is a necessary step before checking the TLD.
The method arrayContains is used to check if the processed TLD exists in the predefined arrays of local TLDs, which is a crucial step in determining the validity of the TLD.
